statements: SELECT * FROM perishable_goods ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, temperature FROM perishable_goods WHERE condition = 'good' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, product_name FROM perishable_goods WHERE temperature > 5;
SELECT * FROM perishable_goods WHERE transportation_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30';
SELECT DISTINCT condition FROM perishable_goods ORDER BY condition ASC;
SELECT * FROM perishable_goods ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, temperature FROM perishable_goods WHERE condition='good'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM perishable_goods WHERE temperature > 10
SELECT product_name, condition, transportation_date FROM perishable_goods WHERE transportation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, product_name, temperature, condition, transportation_date FROM perishable_goods ORDER BY transportation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM TemperatureLogs WHERE temperature > 25.5
SELECT log_id, condition, timestamp FROM TemperatureLogs WHERE log_id = 100
SELECT * FROM PerishableGoods WHERE temperature_threshold < 3.0
SELECT product_name, temperature_threshold FROM PerishableGoods WHERE transport_id = 5
SELECT goods_id, product_name, condition_threshold FROM PerishableGoods ORDER BY goods_id DESC
SELECT * FROM TemperatureLogs WHERE temperature > 28.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT log_id, temperature, timestamp FROM TemperatureLogs WHERE condition = 'High Alert'
SELECT product_name, temperature_threshold FROM PerishableGoods WHERE condition_threshold = 'Critical' ORDER BY goods_id ASC
SELECT goods_id, product_name FROM PerishableGoods WHERE temperature_threshold < 5.0
SELECT * FROM TemperatureLogs JOIN PerishableGoods ON TemperatureLogs.temperature = PerishableGoods.temperature_threshold
SELECT * FROM temperature_readings ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT temperature_id, timestamp, location FROM temperature_readings WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM temperature_readings;
SELECT * FROM goods WHERE perishable = TRUE ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT transport_id, transport_type, driver_name, arrival_timestamp FROM transport WHERE departure_timestamp >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY arrival_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_readings ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, timestamp, temperature FROM temperature_readings WHERE temperature > 25 AND location LIKE '%fridge%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT goods.name, transport.driver_name, transport.departure_timestamp FROM goods JOIN transport ON goods.goods_id = transport.transport_id WHERE perishable = TRUE AND storage_temperature < 5 ORDER BY transport.departure_timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT temperature, location FROM temperature_readings WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND location IN ('Room 101', 'Room 202') ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transport WHERE arrival_timestamp IS NULL ORDER BY departure_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM perishable_goods;
SELECT id, product_name, temperature FROM perishable_goods WHERE condition = 'good';
SELECT transport_id, vehicle_type, destination, start_time, end_time FROM transportation WHERE driver_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT product_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT condition_id, product_id, condition_description FROM product_condition WHERE condition_description LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT * FROM perishable_goods WHERE temperature < 5 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, condition FROM perishable_goods WHERE condition = 'Aging' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT transport_id, vehicle_type, driver_name, destination FROM transportation WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transport_id ASC;
SELECT t.vehicle_type, t.destination, tl.temperature FROM transportation t JOIN temperature_logs tl ON t.transport_id = tl.product_id WHERE tl.temperature > 10 ORDER BY tl.timestamp DESC;

SELECT pc.product_id, pc.condition_description, pl.temperature, pl.timestamp FROM product_condition pc JOIN temperature_logs pl ON pc.product_id = pl.product_id WHERE pl.temperature < 15 ORDER BY pc.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT temperature_id, temperature FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM location_logs WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT goods_name, temperature_threshold FROM perishable_goods ORDER BY goods_name ASC;
SELECT alert_message FROM alerts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT goods_name, temperature_threshold FROM perishable_goods WHERE condition = 'fresh' ORDER BY goods_name ASC;
SELECT start_location, destination, end_timestamp FROM shipment_details WHERE start_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND end_timestamp <= '2022-01-31';

SELECT goods_name, temperature FROM perishable_goods JOIN temperature_logs ON perishable_goods.goods_id = temperature_logs.temperature_id WHERE temperature > temperature_threshold ORDER BY goods_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
